openGraph.title: Emoji & Text Counter
openGraph.description: Count emojis and text at once, including characters without spaces, words, and lines.

title: Emoji & Text Counter
description: Count emojis and text at once, including characters without spaces, words, and lines.
placeholder: Type or paste text and emojis here.
helper: Counts update instantly for characters, words, lines, and emojis.
note: Emoji count is based on Unicode characters; combined emojis may count as multiple.
